# Vexlo - Business Automation for UK SMBs

## About
Vexlo provides intelligent business automation solutions for UK small and medium businesses. We help automate workflows, reduce errors, and scale efficiently.

## Services
- Sales Automation
- Operations Automation
- Finance Automation
- HR Automation
